trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested> event occurs when the user requests help for a control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested>evento ocorre quando o utilizador solicita a ajuda para um controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested>

trans-unit.source: A HelpEventArgs object specifies the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer and whether the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de HelpEventArgs Especifica as coordenadas de ecrã do ponteiro do rato e se o evento foi processado.

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o modelo de evento, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas do ponteiro do rato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the help event was handled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o evento de ajuda foi processado.

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property to `true` the event will be passed to Windows for additional processing.
trans-unit.target: Se definir esta propriedade `true` o evento será transmitido ao Windows para processamento adicional.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento é processado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as coordenadas de ecrã do ponteiro do rato.

trans-unit.source: You can use this information to provide help based on the position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar estas informações para fornecer ajuda com base na posição do ponteiro do rato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> representing the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa as coordenadas de ecrã do ponteiro do rato.
